identified_features.reasoning: Two through holes on the top surface.
A step is present at the junction of the two surfaces.
Three circular pockets are visible on the top and bottom surfaces.
A chamfer is visible on the edge of the base.
Three fillets are present, one on each pocket and one on the chamfered edge.
Two bosses are present, one on the top and one on the side.
One freeform feature is present, a protrusion on the side.
